alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Perkins; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued May 19 at 4:55PM MDT until May 21 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Wyoming and northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Perkins; Southern Foot Hills
